@graph.name: OptizenAI Affiliate Program
@graph.description: Join the OptizenAI affiliate program and earn 25% recurring commissions for life on app installations and AI usage plans. $50 payout threshold with comprehensive affiliate support.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with internet connection
featureList: 25% recurring commissions for life of installed app
Tracking codes for coupons and deals

audience.audienceType: Website owners, marketers, content creators, affiliate marketers

@graph.name: How to Join OptizenAI Affiliate Program
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to joining the OptizenAI affiliate program and start earning commissions

step.name: Complete Application
step.text: Complete and submit the online application at the ShareASale.com server

step.name: Wait for Approval
step.text: Applications are auto-approved but may be re-evaluated for site suitability

step.name: Access Affiliate Dashboard
step.text: Access your Affiliate Account Manager to review program details and download marketing materials

step.name: Implement Tracking
step.text: Use provided HTML code for banners, text links, and affiliate links to ensure proper tracking

step.name: Start Promoting
step.text: Begin promoting OptizenAI while following all program terms and promotion restrictions

mainEntity.name: What commission rates does the OptizenAI affiliate program offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: The program offers 25% recurring commissions for the life of installed app and 25% on AI usage plans.

mainEntity.name: What is the minimum payout threshold?

acceptedAnswer.text: The payout threshold is $50, handled through the ShareASale.com affiliate network.

mainEntity.name: Can anyone join the affiliate program?

acceptedAnswer.text: Anyone is welcome to join, but applications may be rejected for sites promoting inappropriate content, illegal activities, or trademark violations.

mainEntity.name: What marketing restrictions apply to affiliates?

acceptedAnswer.text: Affiliates cannot spam, bid on trademark keywords in PPC campaigns, use parasiteware, or create sites that resemble OptizenAI's website.

mainEntity.name: How are commissions tracked and paid?

acceptedAnswer.text: All tracking and payments are handled through ShareASale.com affiliate network. Affiliates must use provided HTML codes for proper tracking.

@graph.name: OptizenAI Affiliate Program
@graph.description: Join the OptizenAI affiliate program and earn 25% recurring commissions for life on app installations and AI usage plans.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Recurring Commission
hasDefinedTerm.description: Commission earned continuously for the lifetime of a customer's subscription or app installation

hasDefinedTerm.name: Payout Threshold
hasDefinedTerm.description: Minimum commission amount ($50) required before payment is processed

hasDefinedTerm.name: ShareASale Network
hasDefinedTerm.description: Third-party affiliate network handling tracking, reporting, and payments for the program

hasDefinedTerm.name: Licensed Materials
hasDefinedTerm.description: OptizenAI logos, trade names, trademarks, and marketing materials provided to affiliates

hasDefinedTerm.name: Parasiteware
hasDefinedTerm.description: Prohibited software that overwrites affiliate tracking cookies or intercepts traffic

@graph.name: Affiliate Program Benefits
@graph.description: Key benefits and features of joining the OptizenAI affiliate program

itemListElement.name: Lifetime Recurring Commissions
itemListElement.description: Earn 25% commissions for the entire lifetime of customer subscriptions

itemListElement.name: AI Usage Plan Commissions
itemListElement.description: Additional 25% commissions on all AI usage plan purchases

itemListElement.name: Marketing Support
itemListElement.description: Access to banners, HTML codes, tracking links, and promotional materials

itemListElement.name: Real-time Reporting
itemListElement.description: Comprehensive tracking and reporting through ShareASale affiliate dashboard

itemListElement.name: Low Payout Threshold
itemListElement.description: Only $50 minimum payout threshold for quick commission access

itemListElement.name: Auto-approval Process
itemListElement.description: Streamlined application process with automatic approval for qualifying sites
